full_title: I Love You, I’m Sorry by Gracie Abrams
title: I Love You, I’m Sorry

description.plain:
The title “I Love You, I’m Sorry” parallel’s Gracie’s 2020 single “I miss you, I’m sorry”. First teased via Instagram on April 8, 2024, exactly four years after the release of “I miss you, I’m sorry”, the songs share more than just a similarity of titles. Both are about Gracie’s relationship with Blake Slatkin. In an episode of Song Exploder, Gracie discussed how the idea for “I Love You, I’m Sorry” came about:

I had just made a plan to hang and talk with my ex-boyfriend, who I used to write lots of songs about. It had been, like, two years. Like, having never run into each other, you know, no real communication.

The verses of the song tell a story from past and present to future, reflecting on the story of the relationship and where it’s headed now. In her own words:

And then immediately, I was just like, okay, it would be nice if we can make this song feel like there are chapters to it, where it’s like, we’re not just living in one tiny moment, but we’re like past, present, future.

embed_content: Read “I Love You, I’m Sorry” by Gracie Abrams on Genius

body.plain:
The title “I Love You, I’m Sorry” parallel’s Gracie’s 2020 single “I miss you, I’m sorry”. First teased via Instagram on April 8, 2024, exactly four years after the release of “I miss you, I’m sorry”, the songs share more than just a similarity of titles. Both are about Gracie’s relationship with Blake Slatkin. In an episode of Song Exploder, Gracie discussed how the idea for “I Love You, I’m Sorry” came about:

I had just made a plan to hang and talk with my ex-boyfriend, who I used to write lots of songs about. It had been, like, two years. Like, having never run into each other, you know, no real communication.

The verses of the song tell a story from past and present to future, reflecting on the story of the relationship and where it’s headed now. In her own words:

And then immediately, I was just like, okay, it would be nice if we can make this song feel like there are chapters to it, where it’s like, we’re not just living in one tiny moment, but we’re like past, present, future.

lyrics:
74 ContributorsTranslationsУкраїнськаItalianoPolskiPortuguêsFrançaisTürkçeDeutschРусский (Russian)EspañolČeskysrpskiSlovenščinaI Love You, I’m Sorry LyricsThe title “I Love You, I’m Sorry” parallel’s Gracie’s 2020 single “I miss you, I’m sorry”. First teased via Instagram on April 8, 2024, exactly four years after the release of “I miss you, I’m sorry”, the… Read More 
Two Augusts ago
I told the truth, oh, but you didn't like it, you went home
You're in your Benz, I'm by the gate
Now you go alone
Charm all the people you train for, you mean well but aim low
And I'll make it known like I'm getting paid

That's just the way life goes
I like to slam doors closed
Trust me, I know it's always about me
I love you, I'm sorry

Two summers from now
We'll have been talking, but not all that often, we're cool now
I'll be on a boat, you're on a plane
Going somewhere, same
And I'll have a drink
Wistfully lean out my window and watch the sun set on the lake
I might not feel real, but it's okay, mm

'Cause that's just the way life goes
I push my luck, it shows
Thankful you don't send someone to kill me
I love you, I'm sorry

You were the best but you were the worst
As sick as it sounds, I loved you first
I was a dick, it is what it is
A habit to kick, the age-old curse
I tend to laugh whenever I'm sad
I stare at the crash, it actually works
Making amends, this shit never ends
I'm wrong again, wrong again

The way life goes
Joyriding down our road
Lay on the horn to prove that it haunts me
(I'm wrong again, wrong again)
I love you, I'm sorry
The way life goes
(You were the best but you were the worst)
(As sick as it sounds, I loved you first)
I wanna speak in code
(I was a dick, it is what it is)
(A habit to kick, the age-old curse)
Hope that I don't, won't make it about me
(I tend to laugh whenever I'm sad)
(I stare at the crash, it actually works)
I love you, I'm sorry
